concept.title: ChronoClash: Rock Paper Scissors Arena
concept.description: A fast-paced, top-down 2D arena brawler where players master the ancient art of Rock Paper Scissors in a time-bending, ever-evolving combat zone.
concept.theme: Futuristic Neon Arena with Temporal Anomalies
concept.objective: Defeat all opponents in the arena by strategically predicting and countering their moves in a series of Rock Paper Scissors rounds, while navigating environmental hazards and power-ups.
mechanics: Real-time Rock Paper Scissors: Players select Rock, Paper, or Scissors simultaneously each round. The outcome is determined by the classic rules (Rock crushes Scissors, Scissors cuts Paper, Paper covers Rock).
Arena Movement: Players navigate a top-down arena, dodging attacks, positioning themselves, and collecting power-ups.
Temporal Distortions: The arena periodically glitches, introducing temporary effects like slowed time, speed bursts, or random move swaps, adding an element of chaos.
Combo System: Successfully winning consecutive rounds without losing builds a combo meter, increasing damage or granting temporary invincibility.
player_abilities: Dash: A quick burst of speed to evade attacks or close distance.
Shield: A temporary defensive barrier that can block one incoming attack (regardless of type).
Predictive Scan: A brief glimpse into the opponent's potential next move (high cooldown, reveals a probability).
Special Move (Unlocked via Combo Meter): A powerful, unique attack tied to a specific RPS choice that won a combo streak.

enemies.name: Basic Droid
enemies.behavior: Chooses moves somewhat randomly, but will prioritize countering the player's last move if it's an obvious choice. Basic movement patterns.

enemies.name: Temporal Guardian
enemies.behavior: More aggressive, attempts to predict player patterns. Utilizes dash more frequently. Can sometimes trigger localized temporal anomalies.

enemies.name: Chrono-Master
enemies.behavior: Highly intelligent AI that analyzes player history and attempts to bait predictable moves. Will use predictive scan strategically and can unleash powerful special moves.

powerups.name: Temporal Warp Orb
powerups.effect: Instantly teleports the player to a random location on the map, evading all current threats.

powerups.name: Predictive Matrix
powerups.effect: Reveals the opponent's next move with 100% accuracy for the next round.

powerups.name: Combo Amplifier
powerups.effect: Doubles the combo meter gain for a short duration.

concept.level_progression: Players advance through a series of increasingly challenging arenas, facing more difficult enemy types and more complex temporal anomaly patterns. Each arena might have unique environmental hazards. Boss levels could feature a single, powerful Chrono-Master with unique attack phases.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for defeating opponents, winning consecutive rounds (combos), collecting power-ups, and surviving temporal anomalies. Bonus points are awarded for perfectly clean wins (defeating an opponent without losing a single round).
concept.visual_style: Vibrant, futuristic neon aesthetic. Clean, geometric character designs for players and enemies. The arena itself is a glowing, metallic structure with dynamic lighting. Temporal anomalies are visualized with glitch effects, color shifts, and particle trails.
concept.sound_theme: Energetic, synthwave-infused soundtrack with pulsing beats. Distinct sound effects for each RPS choice (e.g., a metallic clang for Rock, a sharp cut for Scissors, a swoosh for Paper). Futuristic UI sounds and dramatic cues for temporal anomalies and special moves.

level_design.name: The Chrono-Cottage
level_design.description: The first arena is a quaint, slightly dilapidated cottage interior, perfect for learning the ropes of ChronoClash. Watch out for rickety furniture and the occasional temporal hiccup!

assets.player: A sleek, angular robot silhouette made of glowing neon blue lines, with a central core pulsing with white light.

enemies.basic: A squat, geometric robot with a bright red neon outline and a single, pulsing yellow eye.
enemies.aggressive: A sharp, spiky robot with aggressive angles, outlined in vibrant pink neon and a rapidly blinking red optic sensor.

powerups.health: A glowing green, stylized heart icon with a soft white aura.
powerups.speed: A stylized, jagged lightning bolt in bright yellow neon.

obstacles.wall: A solid, metallic grey geometric block with faint, pulsing cyan lines along its edges.
obstacles.rock: A rough, dark grey geometric form with sharp edges and subtle, shifting purple highlights.

assets.background: A vast, dark void punctuated by distant, glowing geometric nebulae and pulsating neon grids, with a central, luminous metallic arena structure.

ui_elements.score: Bold, white neon numbers against a transparent background, perhaps with a subtle blue glow.
ui_elements.health_bar: A segmented bar that fills with vibrant green neon. When depleted, segments turn red and flicker.
